channel.title: Nobody can log on my server. Client Null?
channel.description:
yes, this is delta source.
I tried to have my friend login to my server, but they can't. My friend says he is able to log in but gets disconnected right away.
In the terminal it says, "Connection from <ip address>(some number) Client Handler: Client Null disconnected <ip address>
... I worked really hard to make this a good server. I really would appreciate soo much if someone could help!! How can I fix this?? It's probably something so simple.

item.title: Nobody can log on my server. Client Null?
item.dc:creator: @zeroscape12 zeroscape12
item.description:
@zeroscape12 wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:2, topic:538913”]the networking sucks

this happens because the client object (which is used for gameplay) is being created before the player actually logs in

i had the same problem with delta years ago[/quote]

Is there anyway I could fix this?? I’ve put so much work into the server

Read full topic
item.source: Nobody can log on my server. Client Null?
